text: 2.19: Mt 24.24; Zo 6.37; FG 20.30; 1 Ko 11.19Nde ganɨ, mba fharav nza phorga kegi gumgi, mbe guigira nza phorgap nza bɨna bavira ki gumgi fhuvara. Mbe maaŋ muuŋgiap nza thav, vegi. Mbe guigira nza phorgap nza bɨnan ki ntɨɨri fhuvara. Mbe maaŋ muuŋgiap nza bɨna guara ntɨɨri kake, mbe nza phorgap nza bɨnara kae. Mbe nza thav, vegim, nza maaŋ muuŋgiap tuituigiap kaŋgi, mbe guigira nza bɨna ntɨɨri fhuvara.
